LanguageData.VME_CraftingSpeed_Slower.label: slower
LanguageData.VME_CraftingSpeed_Slower.description: A craftmaster must never rush, lest the quality of the product suffer.
LanguageData.VME_CraftingSpeed_SlowerForManual.label: slower for manual
LanguageData.VME_CraftingSpeed_SlowerForManual.descri:
Manual processes are unefficient. We can't waste our precious lives toiling away in mindless manual labour.

<color=#E5E54C>Stats:</color>
 - Non-electric work table speed: -25%.
